channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Takes Ulta Beauty Stake, Sending Shares Up
item.description: The legendary investor added to positions in Chubb and Occidental Petroleum.

item.title: Three different factors could trigger the third wave of a stock market pullback, says strategist
item.description: Dhaval Joshi, chief strategist of BCA Research’s Counterpoint service, says an analysis of the “price complexity” shows that the yen carry trade and the AI bubble are one and the same trade, and that any of three factors could torpedo it.

item.title: Mars Megadeal Shows Big Food Wants to Get Bigger
item.description: Mars’s nearly $30 billion deal to buy Pringles maker Kellanova would push the closely held candy giant into the chips and cracker aisles and hand it more of the growing global snacks business.

item.title: I have my RMD all figured out, except for one thing: Which investments should I take it from?
item.description: If you don’t specify exactly what you want to do, your bank may pull your required minimum distribution equally from all your holdings.

item.title: S&P 500 Climbs With Traders Weighing Size of Rate Cut
item.description: Walmart earnings and retail sales on Thursday will offer more clues on the economy.

item.title: 6 ways to build a successful retirement
item.description: What people in their 50s, 60s and 70s should know about navigating life after work

item.title: U.S. Crude Oil Stockpiles Rise After Six Straight Declines
item.description: Commercial crude oil stocks rose by 1.4 million barrels in the latest week, contrary to analysts’ expectations for a fall, but remain about 5% below the five-year average.

item.title: SEC approves fund that levers up MicroStrategy, which bets on bitcoin
item.description: Investors will now have the opportunity to buy a fund leveraged to a company that is leveraged to an asset that often is bought on leverage.

item.title: Mars Reaches Deal for Cheez-It and Eggo Maker Kellanova
item.description: Mars unveiled a nearly $30 billion deal for foodmaker Kellanova, a sign that big food companies are willing to pay up to increase their snacking portfolios.

item.title: ‘He called me a liar’: I will inherit a $650,000 house from my grandparents, but my husband says I’ll never have any money when I’m older. Is he right?
item.description: “I plan to buy a second home as an investment property.”
